Title: Includes information on congenital heart defect births as part of the department of health's health care and wellness education and outreach program; repealer
Summary: Includes information on congenital heart defect births as part of the department of health's health care and wellness education and outreach program; amends the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง207, rpld ยง2803-j sub 1-e, Pub Health L; amd ยง3, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.9283 & A.7516-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to including information on congenital heart defect births as part of the department of health's health care and wellness education and outreach program; to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the public health law relating to including information on congenital heart defect births in the informational leaflets required to be given to maternity patients, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S. 9283 and A. 7516-A, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
